name: Let's Go!
description: It's Fun time in Let's Go! A FPS/TPS shooter with multiple game styles. Combat. Capture the flag  Free for all and more! A Cartoony and fun Visual style that's great for younger players (and older ones too!) Pick your favorite shooter style, invite your friends and see who is the best! Add Ai to any match, set friendly fire and choose your weapon and player. Made to have fun for everyone!
